1212.content:
"Damnit!" Muttered Toussaint Neshinbara, crumpling the paper into a ball and resting his head on his arms in class. Behind him the hat of a blonde haired teen blinked.

"Uh...Neshinbara? What's wrong?” Asked Tenzo, the ninja whose face was covered mostly by his red scarf, and his cap, with little eyes on top looking at him in concern leaned forward in class.

The deep violet haired boy looked back at his shinobi friend, his blue-green eyes filled with frustration. “I can’t…”

“I can’t what?”

“I can’t think of anything!” He whispered sharply back. Tenzo’s hat blinked several times.

“For a story or a plot?” Tenzo knew his friend and the chief strategist of the Musashi Ariadust Academy as well as it’s secretary was an amateur writer, mainly involved in romance and what not, but to see him so peeved something must clearly be egging at the glasses wearing boy.

“Sort of…” Neshinbara sighed, his shoulder slumping. “No matter what scenario I can think of, it’s either too cliché or too boring. I always dig myself into the First Girls Wins trap due to the development I am forced to have with the main character, but the first girl is usually a major stuck up bitch yeah?” Tenzo nodded. “And there’s a huge assortment of other females that have interesting quirks and qualities about, but I have made the first girl so friggin important by that point that if I try to shoe horn in any development it would make the First Girl’s pointless and the story will be leveled as she is SOMEWHAT important but I don’t want her to fall in love and-“

“Heya guys!” Chirped an all too familiar voice making Neshinbara and Tenzo jumped, their eyes darting towards their school president.

“Don’t scare me like that!” They both snapped at Tori Aoi, who just stood with the a simple grin with a ‘Devil may care’ air around him. Tenzo added a “de gozaru”.

“I heard something of ‘huge’ and ‘females’ and MC,” said Tori. “Are you trying to write a love story Neshin~?” Neshinbara rolled his eyes.

“I’m a writer, what do you think,” Neshinbara looked back to where Tori was standing, but the brown haired teen was…

Rumaging in the trash bin where the writer threw away the draft. “Hey!” Tori already un-crumpled the draft and began to read through it.

“Hmmm…Hmmmm…” He hummed with keen eyes. Neshinbara went up and grabbed the wrinkly paper and tore it up.

“Don’t look through other’s things!”

“But it’s trash! It’s totally okay to read trash right~?”

“Not when I threw it out no less than a minute ago!” Tori just gave his secretary a grin.

“Well I read through anything and you my friend-“ He wrapped his arms around the author. “Need a sounding board.”

“Sounding board?”

“Well of course! You need someone who can listen to your awesome ideas and give ya feedback and how to proceed and that sort of thing! And I-“ He pointed his thumb towards his chest. “I am EXPERT on romance!”

Tenzo stepped in, his hat’s eyes looking deadpanned. “If you mean by going through eroges like how Naomasa goes through pocky then lolicon Ginji would be a better sounding board…”

“Oh yeah and what does Ginji doesn’t have and I do?” Responded Tori diligently.

The two blinked. “A wacked up psyche?” They both asked.

Tori shook his head. “Nope!” He danced around the room, doing unique poses. “I! Have! Ho! Ri!” He stopped behind the mentioned automaton of a girl talking with Shirojiro and his girlfriend…

And gropped her breasts. “Zon!”

And got a round house kick to the face courtesy of Horzion Ariadust and sent flying out the window. The sound of a “I’m flying!” could be heard. Neshinbara sighed and packed up his belongings.

“You heading out?”

“Yeah, call me if you need anything,” sighed Neshinbara as he got up and walked past his shinobi friend. As he reached the door and he tripped on the ledge…

Landing right onto two soft pillows. Neshinbara opened his eyes up…and saw a very amused Kimi Aoi.

“Oh ho? I hear my brother screaming probably courtesy of Horizon and I get the amateur on my breasts,” she cooed in a teasing tone. She crossed her arms, raising her chest higher as Neshinbara recovered and look over her…

151321.content:
On no day in particular, aboard the flying city, the Musashi, Tomo Asama is sitting outside her home, the Asama shrine. Tomo is normally a very sweet girl and is especially kind to all of her friends however Tomo is also pretty strict and is incredible short tempered, especially if her breasts are the topic of the conversation. Tomo has long purple hair and two different colored eyes, one red and one green artificial eye. Along with a bow and arrows, Tomo is also packing a pair of the largest breasts a girl aboard the Musashi could have. Tomo is sitting just outside her shrine waiting for something while wearing her usual skin tight, pink shrine maiden outfit that didn't leave much to the imagination. In contradiction with her personality, Tomo also has knowledge of many dirty things and as no problem showing her knowledge off.

Tomo lays back up against a wall of the shrine and crosses her arms over her massive breasts that stood out in her shrine maiden outfit. Tomo sighs a little and says, "Hmm... my package sure is taking long to get here. I know i only ordered it yesterday but my shrine isn't too far away from where my package was being shipped from."
Tomo sits back for a few more moments and then says, "Perhaps i should just go there myself and get it myself. I knew when i ordered it something would go wrong." Tomo looks down at her giant breasts and says, "Why does everyone always make note of how large my breasts are? I mean aren't big breasts a good thing?" Tomo looks around a bit and then turns around and grabs her gigantic boobs and she then begins to feel them.
Tomo keeps her hands on her chest and says, "Hmm... my breasts are super soft and quite bouncy but i don't see any issues with that really."

Suddenly a voice appears from behind Tomo and says, "Um... Miss Asama?"
Tomo goes into shock and turns around and sees a delivery man behind her. Tomo stays in shock and says, "Judge?"
The delivery man holds out a tall box and says, "I believe this is yours." Almost a fast as lighting, Tomo signs for and takes the box from the delivery man and runs into her house. A few moments later Tomo is in her room of the shrine and as laid out the box on the ground. Tomo is smiling but her face is still red with embarrassment.

Tomo continues to smiles and says, "Finally now i can solve this problem of mine." Tomo rips open the tall box and finds........

1513211.content:
Inside the tall box is what looks like a completely normal helium tank. Tomo kneels over and picks up the helium tank and begins to look it over and comes to the conclusion that it was just an ordinary helium tank, nothing special about it. Tomo looks into the box again and sees a piece of paper inside. Tomo puts her helium tank down next to her and then grabs the piece of paper and begins to read it. The paper said, "Thank you for buying the "better boinger" from "Bigger is Better" industries. This object may look like any ordinary helium tank but don't be mistaking. This tank contains a special gas that can inflate just about anything. You want a pair of bigger boobs? No problem, the helium in this tank can give you a pair of the biggest and not to mention lightest breasts possible." The paper continues on like that for a bit but Tomo stops reading as she gets the idea of what she's holding.

Tomo sighs and says, "I know i'm the one who bought this but i kind of regret it now. I mean...." Tomo looks down at her helium tank and says, "Even it's name sounds fake. The "better boinger"? Couldn't they think of a better name?" Tomo sighs yet again and says, "Oh well i did find this on the net, so it's no surprise that it's a fake. Though i guess i should try it at least. If it really works then i can make my boobs so large that no one will be able to say anything about them. Me and my boobs will be left alone finally." Tomo picks up her helium tank and then says, "Wait maybe i should try this somewhere else. If it really does work. I'd rather not let anyone see me doing this."

Tomo gets up and leaves her room to go to the forest directly behind her home. Normally no one passes through this area, so Tomo should be by herself right now. Tomo makes her way over to a large clearing in said forest and then places the helium tank down and places the hose from it into her mouth. Tomo is a bit worried that something may go wrong but before she can really start worrying, Tomo turns the knob on the tank and helium begins to flow into her body. Tomo felt something happening and when she looks down she sees that her breasts were really inflating.

Tomo couldn't believe her eyes and grabs her inflating breasts out of sheer shock. Tomo shut off the helium tank right away and looks down at her breasts which were now as big as a pair of beach balls, not that this was too much larger then normal. Tomo smiles and says, "Oh my god! It really worked!" Tomo smiles as she gropes and bounces her own inflated boobs about.

Tomo calms down for a second and says, "Wow, they're so light and bounces. This is amazing. i kind of want to try it some more though." Tomo looks around a bit and......

15132111.content:
Tomo goes to inflate herself again but before she could, there's a sudden rustling in the forest behind Tomo. Tomo turns back to see just who it was however, whoever it was hadn't gotten close enough for Tomo to see them. From the sound of the rustling, this person was approaching Tomo's position but they weren't in any rush. Odds are that this person was just lost and had no idea that Tomo was there. If she waited just a few moments, Tomo would be able to see just who was walking towards her but there was no way in hell that Tomo was going to just wait. If anyone saw what Tomo was doing then she might be forced to "remove" this person out of embarrassment.

With amazing speed Tomo picks up her helium tank and runs over to the other end of the forest with her inflated breasts bouncing. Tomo kneels down in her end of the forest and draws her bow and arrows just in case whoever happened to see Tomo. What Tomo didn't see was that the hose from the helium tank had landed in her arrow quiver at some point and that what she was holding was said hose and not one of her special arrows.

Tomo waits a few seconds and the person who appears from the other side of the forest is.......

info.brief_description: An interactive where the girls of the light novel series Kyoukai Senjou no Horizon expand.
info.description:
General Overview
In this interactive we focus on the world of Kyoukai Senjou no Horizon and the pretty young women who inhabit it. This is, of course, for one reason alone; to construct various fetish laden plots pertaining to the aspects of expansion, such as; weight gain, pregnancy, inflation, etc. The world of Kyoukai Senjou no Horizon is a blend of technology and magic of all sorts, so there's plenty of room to include expansion.

For information regarding the series and it's content, see below;

Character List: http://genesis-horizon.wikia.com/wiki/Characters
Terminology and setting info: http://genesis-horizon.wikia.com/wiki/Category:Terminology


+Fetishes that will appear during this story...+
- Stuffing/Weight Gain
- Pregnancy
- Vore
- Inflation


Standard rules apply...
- Only female characters are to expand. Although this doesn't exclude male characters from appearing at all in the interactive.
- Please put forth effort in your chapters.
- Nothing completely outlandish in regards of expansion.
- Let's try to avoid the overly gross situations such as toilet stuff and the like. Burps are fine (farts too, if you play it for comedy), but nothing past that please.
- This is an 18+ interactive so sexual situations are allowed, just...try not to go overboard with them. Use in moderation, basically and try not to have the story revolve too much around it.
